Replicate predictions.

Replicate predictions.

replicate_predictions(fit_model, predict_model, preprocess, X_train, y_train,
  X_test, categorical_variables = NULL, n_samples = 1000,
  progress_bar = TRUE, n_core = 1, ...)

Arguments

fit_model
A function; the function for fitting a model to the data.
predict_model
A function; the function for generating predictions from a fitted model.
preprocess
A function; the function for preprocessing the data. Defaults to NULL.
X_train
A matrix; the independent variables sampled to a training set.
y_train
A vector; the dependent variable sampled to a training set.
X_test
A matrix; the independent variables sampled to a testing set.
categorical_variables
A logical vector; each value TRUE indicates that column in the data.frame is a categorical variable. Defaults to NULL.
n_samples
An integer vector of length one; specifies the number of times the coefficients and predictions should be replicated. Defaults to 1000L.
progress_bar
A logical vector of length one; specifies whether to display a progress bar during calculations. Defaults to TRUE.
n_core
An integer vector of length one; specifies the number of cores to use for this analysis. Currenly only works on Mac OSx and Unix/Linux systems. Defaults to 1L.
...
The arguments to be passed to the algorithm specified.

Value

A list of matrixes, the replicated predictions.

See also

Other replicate: replicate_coefficients, replicate_metrics, replicate_variable_importances

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
